DOC.brief_summary: Intubation is needed in general anesthesia and appropriate cuff pressure is important to avoid trauma or postoperative sore throat and aspiration. Shoulder arthroscope uses some amount of irrigation fluid and it can influence to cuff pressure. Therefore, we will measure cuff pressure during shoulder arthroscope.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Shoulder Edema on Intubated Tube in Patients Undergoing Shoulder Arthroscopy
DOC.criteria: American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) 1,2 Age 2065 emergency operation anticipated difficult intubation chronic obstructive lung disease recent upper respiratory infection
